title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Motor Neurone Disease
purpose: To increase awareness and understanding of motor neurone disease (MND) amongst parliamentarians, to provide a forum for discussion of the challenges facing people living with and affected by MND and to campaign for better access to high quality services for people affected by MND..

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 3000.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Sian Guest, Motor Neurone Disease Association. Tel: 02922 404709
contact_details.secretariat: Motor Neurone Disease Association acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.mndassociation.org/
